ExportedDefinition.AI_NAME: Download Test Cases From ALM using Test ID from Test Lab

Sheet.DataFetchScript:
--Report fetched only Executed test cases (Passed, Failed, Not Completed, NA)-- No Run will not be reported-- --Input the test lab test set ID--
SELECT CY_CYCLE_ID as "Test ID", CF_ITEM_NAME as "Test Set Folder Name", CY_CYCLE as "Test Set Name", RN_TESTER_NAME as "Tester Name" , TS_NAME as "Test Case Name", TS_DESCRIPTION as "Test Case Description", RN_STATUS as "Test Case Status" , ST_EXECUTION_DATE as "Execution Date", /*Test Step.Exec Date*/ ST_STEP_NAME as "Test Step No", ST_DESCRIPTION as "Test Step Description", ST_EXPECTED as "Test Step Expected", ST_ACTUAL as "Test Step Actual", ST_STATUS as "Test Step Status"
FROM step f,Testcycl a, TEST b, CYCLE c,RUN d,CYCL_FOLD e where
f.ST_TEST_ID=b.TS_TEST_ID and e.CF_ITEM_ID=c.CY_FOLDER_ID and a.TC_CYCLE_ID=c.CY_CYCLE_ID and a.TC_TEST_ID=b.TS_TEST_ID and c.CY_CYCLE_ID=d.RN_CYCLE_ID and b.ts_test_id=d.rn_TEST_ID and f.st_run_id=d.rn_run_id and --and CF_ITEM_PATH like '%AAAAACAAA%' and c.CY_CYCLE_ID /*Test Set.Test Set ID*/ in(1218, 1219)/*provide the test lab test set ID here*/
--and /*Provide the Path of the test lab folder from query 1 in CF_ITEM_PATH field*/ --CY_CYCLE like '%%' /* Provide the test lab test set name in CY_CYCLE field */
Sheet.RealSql:
--Report fetched only Executed test cases (Passed, Failed, Not Completed, NA)-- No Run will not be reported-- --Input the test lab test set ID--
SELECT CY_CYCLE_ID as "Test ID", CF_ITEM_NAME as "Test Set Folder Name", CY_CYCLE as "Test Set Name", RN_TESTER_NAME as "Tester Name" , TS_NAME as "Test Case Name", TS_DESCRIPTION as "Test Case Description", RN_STATUS as "Test Case Status" , ST_EXECUTION_DATE as "Execution Date", /*Test Step.Exec Date*/ ST_STEP_NAME as "Test Step No", ST_DESCRIPTION as "Test Step Description", ST_EXPECTED as "Test Step Expected", ST_ACTUAL as "Test Step Actual", ST_STATUS as "Test Step Status"
FROM step f,Testcycl a, TEST b, CYCLE c,RUN d,CYCL_FOLD e where
f.ST_TEST_ID=b.TS_TEST_ID and e.CF_ITEM_ID=c.CY_FOLDER_ID and a.TC_CYCLE_ID=c.CY_CYCLE_ID and a.TC_TEST_ID=b.TS_TEST_ID and c.CY_CYCLE_ID=d.RN_CYCLE_ID and b.ts_test_id=d.rn_TEST_ID and f.st_run_id=d.rn_run_id and --and CF_ITEM_PATH like '%AAAAACAAA%' and c.CY_CYCLE_ID /*Test Set.Test Set ID*/ in(1218, 1219)/*provide the test lab test set ID here*/
--and /*Provide the Path of the test lab folder from query 1 in CF_ITEM_PATH field*/ --CY_CYCLE like '%%' /* Provide the test lab test set name in CY_CYCLE field */

PostProcessBuilder.Script: Sub QC_PostProcessing() Dim MainWorksheet As Worksheet ' Make sure your worksheet name matches! Set MainWorksheet = ActiveWorkbook.Worksheets("Query1") Dim DataRange As Range Set DataRange = MainWorksheet.UsedRange ' Now that you have the data in DataRange you can process it. End Sub
